body.value: Refunds and Travel Funds issues from this cancellation will follow existing Travel Funds rules.
Rapid Rewards Award or Promocert Coupon

If your reservation was purchased using a Rapid Rewardss Award or Promocert Coupon, you may use the Rapid Rewards Award or Promocert Coupon to make another reservation, but be aware that it will maintain the original expiration date.
By canceling this reservation you will lose EarlyBird Check-In® status and the funds will not be refunded from this purchase.

We have found a companion itinerary associated to the member itinerary. By canceling the member itinerary you will also cancel the companion itinerary. If you would like to cancel the companion itinerary only, retrieve the companion reservation by using the companion's confirmation numbers.
